title: Snowman Paul and Kate's Olympic Dream: An Empowering Tale about Perseverance and Big Dreams for Girls
description: Dreams Come true with Snowman Paul!"... perfect to teach perseverance, resilience, and teamwork" Readers' Favorite Kate dreams of skating at the Winter Games, and Snowman Paul and Dan are determined to help her reach her lofty dream. Will Kate's dream come true?Children, parents, and grandparents will enjoy this empowering and delightful tale. It will teach your little ones valuable life lessons about the importance of big dreams, perseverance, and hard work."...just the kind of book I loved to read aloud to my students as a classroom teacher. Katie is the perfect role model for any young child who needs encouragement to give it just one more try." - Verified Amazon CustomerScroll up and grab your copy now!
author: Yossi Lapid
